history.proof: intros d a. induction a using mon_ind. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IHa. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment d, n : nat a : mon d IHa : mult_mon d a (zero_mon d) = a Unable to unify "c_n d n a" with "c_n d (n + 0) a".

original: intros d a. induction a using mon_ind. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IHa. reflexivity.
